AD_Entrance_Minsc_Gale.synopsis: Minsc and Gale arrive at Wyrmway. Minsc boasts about Boo's puzzle skills.

AD_Entrance_Minsc_Gale_2.speaker: Minsc
AD_Entrance_Minsc_Gale_2.text: A puzzle, is it? Boo is most adept at their solving - no matter where Minsc hides the nuts, Boo is always able to sniff them out!

AD_Entrance_Minsc_Gale_0.speaker: Gale
AD_Entrance_Minsc_Gale_0.text: I'm rather a dab hand myself when it comes to a spot of intellectual intrigue...

AD_Entrance_Minsc_Gale_1.speaker: Minsc
AD_Entrance_Minsc_Gale_1.text: The nuts are in my pocket, wizard. Please do not go patting at Minsc's person.
AD_Entrance_Minsc_Gale_1.context: NodeContext: Immediately flat and deadpan. Fun and games when it's Boo searching, but he doesn't want Gale poking at him.
